summary: The Vehicle Safety Research Act of 2025 aims to codify the Partnership for Analytics Research in Traffic Safety (PARTS) program within the Department of Transportation. This program, a continuation of an existing initiative, facilitates research on traffic safety data. The bill outlines program governance, research contracts with external organizations, data privacy protections for participants including confidentiality, and intended uses of collected data. It also includes appropriations for the program for fiscal years 2026-2030, and clarifies the program's relationship to existing regulations and data protection laws.
